history.reason: Ho ho ho! Calling Santa "rigged" is a very naughty thing to say! It's an accusation that seeks to undermine the very spirit of gift-giving and good cheer, much like trying to wish for coal when it's not truly deserved. You're still on the naughty list, young one!
